Package org.parosproxy.paros.db

Class AbstractDatabase

java.lang.Object
org.parosproxy.paros.db.AbstractDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Database
Direct Known Subclasses:
ParosDatabase, SqlDatabase
public abstract class AbstractDatabase extends Object implements Database
An abstract implementation of Database, it allows to manage DatabaseListeners.
Since:
2.5.0

    • close

      public void close(boolean compact)
      Description copied from interface: Database
      Closes the database. If the parameter compact is true, the database will be compacted, compacting the database ensures a minimal space disk usage but it will also take longer to close. Any necessary cleanups are performed prior to closing the database (the cleanup removes the temporary HistoryReferences).

      Note: Calling this method has the same effects as calling the method Database.close(boolean, boolean) with the parameter cleanup as true.

      Specified by:
      close in interface Database
      Parameters:
      compact - true if the database should be compacted, false otherwise.
      See Also:
      • HistoryReference

    • close

      public void close(boolean compact, boolean cleanup)
      Closes the database. If the parameter compact is true, the database will be compacted, compacting the database ensures a minimal space disk usage but it will also take longer to close. If the parameter cleanup is true any necessary cleanups are performed prior to closing the database (the cleanup removes the temporary HistoryReferences.)

      Also, removes the database listeners added previously.

      Specified by:
      close in interface Database
      Parameters:
      compact - true if the database should be compacted, false otherwise.
      cleanup - true if any necessary cleanups should be performed, false otherwise.
      See Also:
      • HistoryReference

    • removeDatabaseListeners

      protected void removeDatabaseListeners()
      Removes all database listeners added.
      See Also:
      • removeDatabaseListener(DatabaseListener)

    • notifyListenersDatabaseOpen

      protected void notifyListenersDatabaseOpen(Collection<DatabaseListener> listeners, DatabaseServer databaseServer) throws DatabaseException
      Notifies the given listeners that the given database server was opened.
      Parameters:
      listeners - the listeners that will be notified
      databaseServer - the database server that was opened
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - if an error occurred while notifying the database listeners.

    • notifyListenersDatabaseOpen

      protected void notifyListenersDatabaseOpen(DatabaseServer databaseServer) throws DatabaseException
      Notifies the database listeners added that the given database server was opened.
      Parameters:
      databaseServer - the database server that was opened
      Throws:
      DatabaseException - if an error occurred while notifying the database listeners.
